tag_list: test-prep, private-tutors, admissions-consulting, private-tutoring, tutoring-companies, tutoring
overview:
Ross Blankenship is the Founder and CEO of StudyHall.com, as well as Chairman of the Board for Top Test Prep. He is active in the EDU tech startup scene and supports other entrepreneurs on a mission to shape the future of higher education.

Ross founded StudyHall, a peer-to-peer learning platform that supports students as they study, share and connect through live collaboration, based on his experiences as an undergraduate at Cornell University.

Ross attended Northfield Mount Hermon School (NMH), Cornell University and Washington University School of Law. At Cornell University, Ross was elected to Cornell’s Educational Policy Committee and Academic Integrity Hearing Board, where he helped develop courses and maintain academic integrity amongst the student body.

He has been published in several magazines and journals, including Next Step Magazine and Education.com.
